mapper.insert: insert into calender(cl_no, me_no, me_id, sp_no, title, content, startdate, enddate, statedate, daydate, cl_date, sp_content) values ((SELECT NVL(MAX(cl_no), 0)+1 as cl_no FROM calender), #{me_no}, #{me_id}, #{sp_no}, #{title}, #{content}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{statedate}, #{daydate}, #{cl_date}, #{sp_content})
